hard_constraints.rule: A dead character cannot speak or act.
A character cannot be in two locations in the same scene.
Cash cannot be spent twice; ledger must balance.
Major events must be triggered by an operator with satisfied prerequisites.

soft_constraints.rule: Avoid modern bureaucratic language; maintain Rome vibes.
Every scene ends on a hook/button line.
Characters should speak in their established voice tags.

production_constraints.visual_style_prompt: All images rendered in the style of 1st-century BCE charcoal sketches on rough papyrus. Heavy use of crosshatching for shadows. Sepia and ochre tones with occasional deep crimson accents. No photorealism.
